definitions.definition: A village and civil parish in city of Chelmsford district, Essex , England ( OS grid ref TL7404 ) .
A village and civil parish in North Hertfordshire district, Hertfordshire , England ( OS grid ref TL3234 ) .
A village in Sandon and Burston parish, Stafford district, Staffordshire , England ( OS grid ref SJ9429 ) .
A ghost town in the Kootenay region of British Columbia , Canada .
A locality in central Victoria , Australia .
